channel.title: 🏢 UC Berkeley on AI Paper Reviews by AI
channel.description: Recent content in 🏢 UC Berkeley on AI Paper Reviews by AI

item.title: Precise and Dexterous Robotic Manipulation via Human-in-the-Loop Reinforcement Learning
item.description: Human-in-the-loop RL enables robots to master complex manipulation tasks with near-perfect success rates and superhuman speed, exceeding prior methods.

item.title: Task Vectors are Cross-Modal
item.description: Vision-language models surprisingly use similar internal representations for similar tasks regardless of input type (image or text) or specification (example or instruction).
